document_data.name: Ground Defense League
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ground Defense League''' was one of the military organizations that served as the police force and core of the military forces of the kingdom of [[Akanûl]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Ground Defense League was in charge of the defense of the city of [[Airspur]] and the rest of the kingdom. Their main purpose was to guard the palaces of the nobles, the [[Airspur/Catacombs|Catacombs]] of Airspur, and the [[Airspur/Cliff Prison|Cliff Prison]].
document_data.Membership:
The Ground Defense League was made up of [[genasi]] of all manifestations, but earthsouls and watersouls were the most common among their members.

The Ground Defense League was under the leadership of the [[Four Stewards|Steward of Fire]]. ''Circa'' [[1479 DR]], the Steward of Fire was [[Magnol]].
